Sentencas: In this work, we investigate using nanoscale X-ray fluorescence spectroscopy the degradation processes of a cathode and an electrolyte supported cell, produced by two different suppliers, that have been long-term operated in electrolysis mode.
Titulo: X-ray fluorescence nano-imaging of long-term operated solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: High-resolution compositional analysis in combination with high lateral resolution are presented in the format of a 2D map with 50 nm resolution for Ni, Y, Ce, Gd, La, Sr, Co, Fe.
Titulo: X-ray fluorescence nano-imaging of long-term operated solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: We report on the different elements that are diffusing already during the sintering process as well as their evolution after long-term operation.
Titulo: X-ray fluorescence nano-imaging of long-term operated solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: In both type of cell, Co is the element that is highly segregating from the LSCF electrode during the electrochemical reaction.
Titulo: X-ray fluorescence nano-imaging of long-term operated solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: The CGO barrier does not prevent the diffusion of Sr in the electrolyte of the CSC cell while it does in the ESC cell.
Titulo: X-ray fluorescence nano-imaging of long-term operated solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: In addition, the contact layer between the hydrogen electrode and the electrolyte in the ESC cell seems to prevent the Ni depletion.
Titulo: X-ray fluorescence nano-imaging of long-term operated solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: A high concentration of gadolinium from the CGO layer is visible at the CGO/electrolyte interface on the oxygen electrode side as well as on the hydrogen electrode side in the ESC cell.
Titulo: X-ray fluorescence nano-imaging of long-term operated solid oxide electrolysis cells

Sentencas: The gadolinium concentration significantly increases during the cell operation to form a layer of a few micrometers.
Titulo: X-ray fluorescence nano-imaging of long-term operated solid oxide electrolysis cells
